summary: Change the Brazilian Portuguese html charsets (ccedil) to char (รง).
name: html_portuquese
description:
Useful for all people who edit Brazilian Portuguese websites in HTML or PHP with Vim.
On loading a HTML or PHP file, this script replaces all the html-encoded (ccedil, atilde, etc) with their normal Ascii-Chars (รง,รฃ, etc) so they're more easily readable.

When you save the file, all Ascii-Chars are replaced by the HTML Encoding.
install_details: put it into vim plugin folder (/usr/share/vim/vim61/plugin) or in your ~/.vim/plugin/ folder

versions.release_notes: fixed a bug typo with acute string
